translations.text: Khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; yukawwirul laila 'alan nahaari Wa-yukawwirun nahaara 'alaal laili Wa-sakhkharash shamsa walqamara kulluny yajree li-ajalim musammaa; alaa Huwal 'Azeezul Ghaffaar

words.en: And whoever||Allah guides||Allah guides||then not||for him||any||misleader||Is not||Allah||All-Mighty||All-Able of retribution||All-Able of retribution

translations.text: Wa-maien yahdil laahu famaa lahoo min mudil; alai-sal laahu bi'azeezin zin tiqaam

translations.text: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunal laah; qul afara'aitum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi in araadaniyal laahu bidurrin hal hunna kaashi-faatu durriheee aw araadanee birahmatin hal hunna mumsikaatu rahmatih; qul hasbiyal laahu alaihi yatawakkalul mutawakkiloon

words.en: Say||O my people!||Work||(according) to||your position||indeed I am||working||then soon||you will know

translations.text: Qul yaa qawmi'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee aamilun fasawfa ta'lamoon

words.id: siapa||akan datang padanya||azab||menghinakannya||dan menimpa||atasnya||azab||tetap/kekal

translations.text: Maien yaateehi azaabunien yukhzeehi Wa-yahillu alaihi 'azaabum muqeem

translations.text: Wa-law anna lillazeena zalamoo maa fil ardi jamee'anw Wa-mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bihee min sooo'il azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; Wa-badaa lahum minal laahi maa lam yakoonoo yahtasiboon

words.id: Allah||pencipta||segala||sesuatu||dan Dia||atas||segala||sesuatu||penjaga

translations.text: Wa-nufikha fis Soori fasa'iqa man fis samaawaati Wa-man fil ardi illaa man shaa'al lahu summa nufikha feehi ukhraa fa-izaa hum qiyaamuny yanzuroon

words.id: dan terang benderang||bumi||dengan cahaya||Tuhannya||dan diletakkan||kitab||dan didatangkan||para Nabi||dan para saksi||dan diberi keputusan||diantara mereka||dengan benar/adil||dan/sedang mereka||tidak||mereka dianiaya/dirugikan

translations.text: Wa-ashraqatil ardu binoori Rabbihaa Wa-wudi'al Kitaabu Wa-jeee'a bin-nabiyyeena wash-shuhadaaa'i Wa-qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi Wa-hum laa yuzlamoon

words.en: And (will) be paid in full||every||soul||what||it did||and He||(is the) Best-Knower||of what||they do

translations.text: Wa-seeqal lazeena kafaroo ilaa jahannama zumaraa hattaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa futihat abwaabuhaa Wa-qaala lahum khazanatuhaaa alam ya'tikum Rusulun minkum yatloona alaikum Aayaati Rabbikum Wa-yunziroonakum liqaaa'a Yawmikum haazaa; qaaloo balaa Wa-laakin haqqat kalimatul azaabi 'alal kaafireen

translations.text: Qeelad khuloo abwaaba jahannama khaalideena feeha fabi'sa maswal mutakabbireen

words.id: dan dihalau/digiring||orang-orang yang||(mereka) bertakwa||Tuhan mereka||ke||sorga||berbondong-bondong||sehingga||apabila||mereka sampai kepadanya||dan dibuka||pintu-pintunya||dan berkata||kepada mereka||penjaga-penjaganya||kesejahteraan||atas kalian||baiklah/bahagialah kamu||maka masukilah ia/sorga itu||dalam keadaan kekal
words.en: And (will) be driven||those who||feared||their Lord||to||Paradise||(in) groups||until||when||they reach it||and (will) be opened||its gates||and (will) say||to them||its keepers||Peace be||upon you||you have done well||so enter it||(to) abide eternally

translations.text: Wa-seeqal lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum ilal Jannati zumaraa hattaaa izaa jaaa'oohaa Wa-futihat abwaabuhaa Wa-qaala lahum khazanatuhaa salaamun alaikum tibtum fadkhuloohaa khaalideen

words.id: dan mereka berkata||segala puji||bagi Allah||yang||membenarkan/memenuhi pada kami||janji-Nya||dan Dia mewariskan kepada kami||bumi/negeri||kami tinggal/menempati||dari/di||sorga||dimana saja||kami kehendaki||maka sebaik-baik||pahala/balasan||orang-orang yang beramal
words.en: And they will say||All praise||(be) to Allah||Who||has fulfilled for us||His promise||and has made us inherit||the earth||we may settle||in||Paradise||wherever||we will||So excellent is||(the) reward||(of) the workers

translations.text: Wa-qaalull hamdulillaahil lazee sadaqanaa wa'dahoo Wa-awrasanal arda natabaw wa-u minal jannati haisu nashaaa'u fani'ma ajrul aamileen

words.id: dan kamu akan melihat||para Malaikat||meliputi/berkerumun||dari||sekitar/sekeliling||'Arsy||mereka bertasbih||dengan memuji||Tuhan mereka||dan diberi keputusan||diantara mereka||dengan benar/adil||dan dikatakan||segala puji||bagi Allah||Tuhan||semesta alam
words.en: And you will see||the Angels||surrounding||[from]||around||the Throne||glorifying||(the) praise||(of) their Lord||And (will) be judged||between them||in truth||and it will be said||All praise be||to Allah||(the) Lord||(of) the worlds

translations.text: Wa-taral malaaa'ikata haaaffeena min hawlil Arshi yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim Wa-qudiya bainahum bilhaqqi Wa-qeelal hamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen
